title: Astro's Journey from Static Site Generator to Next.js Rival
author: Richard MacManus
description: Astro is like a souped up Static Site Generator, but despite less reliance on JavaScript, it is just as powerful as Next.js, Vue, and other web frameworks.
cntitle: Astro 从静态网站生成器到 Next.js 劲敌的旅程
cndescription: Astro 就像一个功能强大的静态网站生成器，但尽管它对 JavaScript 的依赖性较低，但它与 Next.js、Vue 和其他 Web 框架一样强大。
